entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as standing with his head bowed and his white hands folded over the Elder Wand in front of him, which might have been praying or else counting silently in his mind.

entities.name: fenrir
entities.description: Fenrir is described as skulking and chewing his long nails.

entities.name: rowle
entities.description: Rowle is described as the great blonde who was dabbing at his bleeding lip.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is described as looking defeated and terrified, with sunken eyes full of apprehension.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is described as having sunken eyes full of apprehension.

entities.name: dolohov
entities.description: Dolohov is described as saying 'No sign of him, my Lord' to Voldemort.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is described as rejoined the circle with Dolohov.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Nagini is described as floating in her glittering, charmed cage behind Voldemort's head.

relationships.description: Voldemort spoke to Dolohov when he looked up after Dolohov and Yaxley rejoined the circle.
Voldemort also spoke to Yaxley when he looked up after Dolohov and Yaxley rejoined the circle.
Dolohov reported to Voldemort that there was no sign of Harry.
